title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2838/95 of 8 December 1995 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3846/87 as regards the nomenclature of poultrymeat products for export refunds
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EC) No 2838/95 of 8 December 1995 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3846/87 as regards the  nomenclature of poultrymeat products for export refunds
THE COMMISSION OF THE  EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: That part of the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3846/87 which relates  to Sector 7 shall be replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1996.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 December 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
ANNEX
'7. Poultrymeat >TABLE>
